original_text: and some Hebrews crossed the fords of the Jordan to the land of Gad and Gilead. Saul was still at Gilgal, and all the people followed him trembling.
korean_text: 어떤 히브리 사람들은 요단을 건너 갓과 길르앗 땅으로 가되 사울은 아직 길갈에 있고 그를 따른 모든 백성은 떨더라

sentences.original_text: and some Hebrews crossed the fords of the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 히브리 사람들은 요단 강 나루턱을 건넜으며

sentences.original_text: to the land of Gad and Gilead
and all the people followed him trembling
